backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, cart, wishlist, lookbook, user session, guest session, and site content types plus storage maps and access control integration.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that upgrades siteContent to include a new banners field and returns a new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining the WhatsApp number configuration variable.
frontend/index.css: Initializes Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH-based CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component controlling navigation across storefront and admin pages with header, footer, and router-like state management.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageBa: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting homepage banners with form handling and mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component that handles authentication, admin checks, navigation, and renders the admin panel UI with a sidebar and header.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying navigation links, social media icons, branding, and contact links.
frontend/src/components/GuestMergePrompt: Dialog prompting users to merge guest cart or wishlist items into their authenticated account.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, search, authentication handling, theme toggle, and cart/wishlist indicators for both guests and logged-in users.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageBan: Displays rotating homepage banner carousel with navigation, text decoding, and click routing.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageSec: Renders homepage content sections with titles, images, and text, ending with a navigation button.
frontend/src/components/MediaSlotUploade: Image upload widget that previews, uploads, replaces, and removes images using ExternalBlob with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card showing product image, price, colors, wishlist button, and quick-view navigation.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: Simple rich text editor with formatting toolbar, contentEditable area, and HTML value syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestCart.ts: Manages a guest user's cart locally with add, remove, and clear operations synced to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestWishlist.ts: Manages a guest user's wishlist locally with add, remove, and clear operations using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageBanners.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and modifying banners via the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, logging in, and clearing identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, cart, wishlist, lookbook, and admin product data via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Fetches and mutates site content settings with fallbacks, including publishing and dark mode toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Manages theme mode with localStorage overrides and applies light or dark classes to the document.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes with gold-focused design utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and imagery explaining the brandâ€™s purpose and offerings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Displays product categories with search and sortable stats derived from all products. Supports sorting by name or product count within an admin layout.
Shows admin overview with product, category, and lookbook statistics plus quick navigation actions. Computes inventory value and category counts using product data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLookbook.t: Manages lookbook images with search, sorting, and a dialog for adding or editing entries, including image uploads and tagged products. Uses backend queries and handles upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Provides full CRUD management for products with search, filtering, sorting, and image upload support. Includes a dialog for adding or editing product details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessions.t: Displays informational user session and privacy details along with placeholder analytics cards. No dynamic data yet, mainly static descriptions within an admin layout.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for editing site content including hero text, contact details, banners, and dark mode, with draft and publish actions.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart using guest cart logic, product details, and item removal.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Builds a WhatsApp-based checkout summary using guest cart items and product data.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact page with hero text, contact info cards, and a basic non-functional contact form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage with banners, category cards, featured products, and dynamically loaded site content.
frontend/src/pages/Lookbook.tsx: Shows a gallery of lookbook images with product tags and a dialog for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Implements product listing with category, size, color filters, sorting, and responsive filter UI.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Displays product images, details, selectable options, and supports adding to cart or wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Shows wishlist items or an empty state, using product data to render saved products.
frontend/src/utils/bannerDestination.ts: Defines banner destination types and provides encode/decode helpers and click handler generation.
frontend/src/utils/bannerEncoding.ts: Utility for encoding and decoding banner text objects to and from JSON strings.
frontend/src/utils/localCart.ts: Manages guest cart persistence in localStorage with versioning and BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/localWishlist.ts: Handles guest wishlist storage and retrieval from localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/utils/siteContentDefaults.t: Provides default site content values including hero text, contact details, footer items, and banners.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp checkout URL with formatted order details from cart items.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, themes, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes project state, homepage redesign goals, feature requirements, and admin-editable banner needs.
